title: Short-Intensive Course for Strengthening Nursing Clinical Competencies Based on Constructivism

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Course strengthening problem-solving abilities in nursing clinical scenarios through project-based assessment in real-time video class environments utilizing personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Nursing students can develop patient-centered care interventions through clinical case analysis.
Learners demonstrate collaborative problem-solving skills based on constructivist learning principles in an online simulation environment.
Post-training participants can design practical strategies that account for complex clinical factors (environmental/emotional elements, etc.).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
